title: Trump impeachment: Democrats to hold vote in bid to undermine Republican 'cover-up'
text:
The House of Representatives will hold a formal vote this week to open impeachment proceedings against Donald Trump, marking the latest escalation in the process that has threatened his presidency.

The measure was announced by House speaker Nancy Pelosi in a letter sent to her fellow Democrats on Monday, and comes just after Republicans in the Senate launched an attack on the inquiry aimed at delegitimising Democrats' tactics.

While the exact text of the resolution was not immediately made public, Democrats have said it will formalise procedures as they pursue the next steps in the impeachment process.

More follows...
description: The House of Representatives will hold a formal vote this week to open impeachment proceedings against Donald Trump, marking the latest escalation in the process that has threatened his presidency.The measure was announced by House speaker Nancy Pelosi in a letter sent to her fellow Democrats on Monday
